problem_text:
17.26. Are the classes of right-orderable and right-ordered groups closed under taking solutions of equations w(a1, . . . , ak, x1, . . . , xn) = 1? (Here the closures are under group embeddings and order-preserving embeddings, respectively.) This is true for equations with a single constant, when k = 1 (J. Group Theory, 11 (2008), 623–633).
V. V. Bludov, A. M. W. Glass
